Package interfaces

Interface PassengerInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    RegularPassenger

    public interface PassengerInterface

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      com.google.maps.model.LatLng getCurrentCoords​()
      Returns current location of the passenger as a LatLng-object (coordinates).
      com.google.maps.model.LatLng getDestinationCoords​()
      Returns location of the destination as a LatLng-object (coordinates) of the passenger.
      int getId​()
      Returns the id of the passenger.
      com.google.maps.model.LatLng getOriginCoords​()
      Returns a LatLng-object representing the origin of the passenger (the point where routing was started for the passenger).
      PassengerStatus getStatus​()
      Returns current status of the passenger as a BusStatus-enum.
      void setCurrentCoords​(com.google.maps.model.LatLng currentCoords)
      Sets the currentCoords-variable of the passenger to the specified LatLng-object.
      void setStatus​(PassengerStatus status)
      Sets the status of the passenger to the specified BusStatus-enum.

    • Method Detail

      • getId

        int getId​()
        Returns the id of the passenger. Id is used for a multitude of different operations.
        Returns:
        returns the int-value representing the id of the passenger

      • getDestinationCoords

        com.google.maps.model.LatLng getDestinationCoords​()
        Returns location of the destination as a LatLng-object (coordinates) of the passenger.
        Returns:
        returns the LatLng-object representing the location of the destination.

      • setStatus

        void setStatus​(PassengerStatus status)
        Sets the status of the passenger to the specified BusStatus-enum.
        Parameters:
        status - specifies the status to be set for the passenger

      • setCurrentCoords

        void setCurrentCoords​(com.google.maps.model.LatLng currentCoords)
        Sets the currentCoords-variable of the passenger to the specified LatLng-object.
        Parameters:
        currentCoords - specifies the LatLng-object the passenger should currently be at

      • getCurrentCoords

        com.google.maps.model.LatLng getCurrentCoords​()
        Returns current location of the passenger as a LatLng-object (coordinates).
        Returns:
        returns the LatLng-object representing the current location of the passenger.

      • getStatus

        PassengerStatus getStatus​()
        Returns current status of the passenger as a BusStatus-enum.
        Returns:
        returns the BusStatus-enum representing the current status of the passenger.

      • getOriginCoords

        com.google.maps.model.LatLng getOriginCoords​()
        Returns a LatLng-object representing the origin of the passenger (the point where routing was started for the passenger).
        Returns:
        returns the LatLng-object representing the origin of the passenger.
